title: SESSION RESULT overview page
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a list of all SESSION RESULTS
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* There is a dedicated page (with a dedicated URL) where all SESSION RESULTS are presented.
* A warning message is shown when there are no SESSION RESULTS.
* The overview page always returns with status code \`200\`, no matter if any SESSION RESULT exists or not.
* By default, the SESSION RESULTS are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* The sorting is always case-insensitive.
* Each SESSION RESULT is presented with its primary information and a link to its detail page.
* The overview displays at most 100 SESSION RESULTS at once.
* When there are more than 100 SESSION RESULTS then the \`pagination\` feature is activated.
* Pagination allows the user to scroll through all SESSION RESULTS - 100 items at a time.
* The user is able to bookmark and revisit any paginated SESSION RESULT page.
